original_text: Novo Nordisk A/S (NVO) Q1 2021 Earnings Call Transcript Novo Nordisk A/S to Host Earnings Call Novo Nordisk's (NVO) Q1 Earnings and Sales Beat Estimates Novo Nordisk lifts guidance after first quarter beats expectations Novo Nordisk's net profit increased by 6% in the first three months of 2021
